content.rendered:
One of Singapore’s leading main contractors, Lum Chang Building Contractors (LCBC) is consistently ranked by Singapore’s Building and Construction Authority as a Grade A1 contractor under the Contractor Registry System, and a Class 1 General Builder under the Licensing of Builders.

LCBC’s environmental initiatives are certified under the internationally recognised Environmental Management System Certificate (ISO 14001) as well as the Quality Management System Certificate (ISO 9001). Our Occupational Health and Safety Management System is also internationally recognised under ISO 45001.
